name: Will Glow the Wisp
detailed_description:
In "Will Glow the Wisp" a platformer without platforms, you need to break out of a magical prison. The unique movement and combat mechanics make it an unforgettable experience.



  • Campaign
  • Play vs another player’s recordings
  • Endless Mode
  • Beat the Developer
  • Global Highscore




You are able to play against the Developer in “Will Glow the Wisp”, but only the best players will be able to handle this challenge. Are you good enough for this challenge?




In this mode you will be able to compete in a global Highscore to survive as long as you can. Each level will have differently generated challenges and once the level is cleared, another level is loaded with different and more difficult challenges.

short_description: Will Glow the Wisp is a physics based abstract platformer without platforms, with a unique particle based theme and movement mechanics. It is best described as a mix of Super Meat Boy and Geometry Wars.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2 or higher
  • Processor: 1.80GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 (1024 MB Ram)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB Ram)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
